version_description: - Added YES/NO dialog to reset pose button

- Complete overhaul of all 3D models.
- Uses new mesh skining system
- New rigging system for better movements
- All meshes have new weight painting redone for smooth results.
- added new realtime Sketch mode for artists to quickly create drawings for illustrations, childrens books, storyboarding, comic books, manga, digital painting and animation

- Added new finger save code
- Complete overhaul of all 3D models.
- Uses new mesh skining system
- New rigging system for better movements
- All meshes have new weight painting redone for smooth results.
- added new realtime Sketch mode for artists to quickly create drawings for illustrations, childrens books, storyboarding, comic books, manga, digital painting and animation

Added - Fix to a rigging issue
Added - Camera rotation lock button
Added - Wood mode figure
Added - Wood Sketch mode overlay with sketch line for figure types
Added - Black mode or Silhouette mode
Added - New camera rotation algorithm
Added - Bug fixes

Added - Updated Screenshot capture mode on IOS
---------------------------------
Added - Fix to a rigging issue
Added - Camera rotation lock button
Added - Wood mode figure
Added - Wood Sketch mode overlay with sketch line for figure types
Added - Black mode or Silhouette mode
Added - New camera rotation algorithm
Added - Bug fixes

Added support for faster mobile devices. Now posing speed is universal across all device speeds
Updated Muscle Maps
Updated Help file
Minor Fixes
-------
Added new Skeleton Mode
Added ability to pose abs in all 3 directions
Added more realistic shoulder deforms to support extreme poses
Using a new pose loading system

Year 2020 Update

- Added new Camera Lucida feature to setup shots or use for creating your illustrations
- Added comic book modes for figures
- Added new skeleton modes
- Added XYZ girds which you can tun on or off
- Added a red dot to show which body part you clicked on
-Added ability to pose hips for complex angles
-
New Feature. Added new inventory system. Allows you to attach 100's of everyday objects to body parts. More items will be added with each new update
